item.mcda.archers.tooltip_1: Preferido por guerreros humildes, es barato
item.mcda.archers.tooltip_2: de hacer y aún detiene una espada.
item.mcda.beehive_armor.tooltip_1: La Armadura de Colmena zumba con el
item.mcda.beenest_armor.tooltip_2: zumbido alrededor de la Armadura de Nido de Abejas. O
item.mcda.beenest_armor.tooltip_3: quizás el zumbido viene de dentro?
item.mcda.hunters.tooltip_1: Puede no ser adecuado para un caballero,
item.mcda.splendid_robe.tooltip_2: es usada por los guerreros Illager endurecidos que protegen al Arch-Illager.
item.mcda.splendid_robe.tooltip_3: guerreros Illager que protegen al Arch-Illager.
item.mcda.battle_robe.tooltip_2: Evocadores de la corte del Arch-Illager.
item.mcda.champions_armor.tooltip_3: como un símbolo de agradecimiento por muchos
item.mcda.champions_armor.tooltip_5: La marca de un verdadero héroe.
item.mcda.heros_armor.tooltip_1: Solo otorgada a los héroes de más alto calibre, esta armadura es un precioso regalo
item.mcda.titans_shroud.tooltip_1: Esta armadura ha pasado a través
item.mcda.titans_shroud.tooltip_2: de las manos del mal durante generaciones.
item.mcda.dark_armor.tooltip_1: Esta armadura, hecha en las negruras
item.mcda.dark_armor.tooltip_2: más profundas de la Forja Ardiente, es usada
item.mcda.royal_guard_armor.tooltip_1: Esta armadura, hecha en las negruras
item.mcda.royal_guard_armor.tooltip_2: más profundas de la Forja Ardiente, es usada
item.mcda.verdant_robe.tooltip_1: Aquellos que visten esta túnica pronto descubren
item.mcda.verdant_robe.tooltip_2: que pueden comunicarse con más almas
item.mcda.grim_armor.tooltip_1: Esta armadura invoca un sentimiento de terror
item.mcda.grim_armor.tooltip_2: para quien la lleva y para
item.mcda.grim_armor.tooltip_3: aquellos que se enfrentan en batalla.
item.mcda.wither_armor.tooltip_1: Forjada con partes de enemigos caídos,
item.mcda.curious_armor.tooltip_1: Nadie sabe de dónde vino esta extraña
item.mcda.mercenary_armor.tooltip_2: ahorrar algo de dinero. Carece de
item.mcda.renegade_armor.tooltip_1: Esta armadura fue un buen pago
item.mcda.hungry_horror.tooltip_2: el sonido de los gritos llena
item.mcda.phantom_armor.tooltip_2: de Fantasmas, es una vista aterradora
item.mcda.frost_bite_armor.tooltip_1: Mordedura Helada recuerda los vientos helados
item.mcda.frost_bite_armor.tooltip_2: que una vez fluyeron bajo las alas
item.mcda.plate_armor.tooltip_1: La Armadura de Placas convierte al soldado promedio
item.mcda.plate_armor.tooltip_2: en una fortaleza pero reduce la
item.mcda.full_metal_armor.tooltip_1: La Armadura de Metal Completo está destinada a
item.mcda.full_metal_armor.tooltip_2: los grandes defensores del Mundo Superior.
item.mcda.reinforced_mail.tooltip_2: la Malla Reforzada es una vista común
item.mcda.reinforced_mail.tooltip_3: a lo largo de la tierra.
item.mcda.stalwart_armor.tooltip_1: Esta armadura confiable es lo suficientemente robusta
item.mcda.ghostly_armor.tooltip_1: Aquellos que visten la Armadura Fantasmal pueden
item.mcda.ghostly_armor.tooltip_2: sentir que sus cuerpos se desconectan brevemente
item.mcda.ghost_kindler.tooltip_1: Llamas extrañas siguen la forma cambiante
item.mcda.ghost_kindler.tooltip_2: de aquellos que visten la armadura Encendedor
item.mcda.mystery_armor.tooltip_1: Algunos herreros ven la influencia del diseño
item.mcda.mystery_armor.tooltip_2: de los Gólems de Hierro en esta
item.mcda.scale_mail.tooltip_1: Esta armadura, forjada cerca de las costas
item.mcda.scale_mail.tooltip_2: de un gran mar, fue inspirada por las
item.mcda.highland_armor.tooltip_1: Un armero sabio hizo esta armadura con cuidado,
item.mcda.highland_armor.tooltip_2: tiene elementos de los aldeanos de la montaña.
item.mcda.snow_armor.tooltip_1: Una armadura que fue templada en
item.mcda.snow_armor.tooltip_2: el derretimiento de la nieve, protegiendo al portador de
item.mcda.snow_armor.tooltip_3: el frío severo de la tundra.
item.mcda.frost_armor.tooltip_1: Esta armadura legendaria, forjada de hielo
item.mcda.frost_armor.tooltip_2: que nunca se derrite, hace que el portador
item.mcda.frost_armor.tooltip_3: se sienta como uno con el invierno.
item.mcda.soul_robe.tooltip_1: Bajo una luz particular, las almas
item.mcda.soul_robe.tooltip_2: tejidas en la tela de la Túnica de Alma
item.mcda.souldancer_robe.tooltip_1: La Túnica de Bailealmas cobra vida
item.mcda.souldancer_robe.tooltip_2: en la luz, como si las almas
item.mcda.souldancer_robe.tooltip_3: dentro estuvieran bailando por toda la eternidad.
item.mcda.spelunker_armor.tooltip_1: La Armadura de Espeleólogo es usada por aquellos
item.mcda.spelunker_armor.tooltip_2: que se adentran en las profundidades más oscuras del
item.mcda.cave_crawler.tooltip_1: The Cave Crawler armor has been passed
item.mcda.thief_armor.tooltip_1: This armor is light, nimble, and
item.mcda.spider_armor.tooltip_2: thieves, is inspired by the agile
item.mcda.wolf_armor.tooltip_1: Many warriors wear the heads of
item.mcda.wolf_armor.tooltip_2: wolves into battle to strike fear
item.mcda.wolf_armor.tooltip_3: into the hearts of their enemies.
item.mcda.black_wolf_armor.tooltip_1: The wolf who strikes from the
item.mcda.black_wolf_armor.tooltip_2: shadows lives to tell the tale.
item.mcda.fox_armor.tooltip_2: armor to honor the fox, who is a great
item.mcda.fox_armor.tooltip_3: and agile warrior. This piece strikes
item.mcda.fox_armor.tooltip_4: terror into the hearts of many enemies
item.mcda.fox_armor.tooltip_5: as it has a reputation for being quite
item.mcda.arctic_fox_armor.tooltip_1: If you want to survive in the icy
item.mcda.arctic_fox_armor.tooltip_2: tundra in style, the Arctic Fox Armor
item.mcda.arctic_fox_armor.tooltip_3: is the best choice this season.
item.mcda.emerald_gear.tooltip_1: As you wear the Emerald Armor during
item.mcda.emerald_gear.tooltip_3: emeralds to you as if by chance.
item.mcda.opulent_armor.tooltip_2: for show than combat, thrives in the
item.mcda.gilded_glory.tooltip_1: Even death itself has to pause and
item.mcda.gilded_glory.tooltip_2: admire the charms of the legendary
item.mcda.climbing_gear.tooltip_1: This study Climbing Gear is perfect
item.mcda.climbing_gear.tooltip_2: for braving the blistering cold of
item.mcda.rugged_climbing_gear.tooltip_1: Take on the worst that nature can
item.mcda.rugged_climbing_gear.tooltip_2: throw at you in this rugged armor.
item.mcda.goat_gear.tooltip_1: Made from the pelts of Mountain
item.mcda.goat_gear.tooltip_3: from peak to peak in this Goat Gear.
item.mcda.sprout_armor.tooltip_1: The dark vines of the Sprout Armor
item.mcda.sprout_armor.tooltip_2: continue to grow, even in complete
item.mcda.living_vines_armor.tooltip_1: This armor is made from the living
item.mcda.living_vines_armor.tooltip_2: vines of a plant which grows only
item.mcda.piglin_armor.tooltip_1: Wearing the Piglin Armor is almost
item.mcda.piglin_armor.tooltip_2: enough to make one feel at home in
item.mcda.squid_armor.tooltip_1: It was easy to make this jet-black
item.mcda.squid_armor.tooltip_2: armor look cool. The hard part was
item.mcda.glow_squid_armor.tooltip_1: Those who hunt elusive glow squids
item.mcda.glow_squid_armor.tooltip_2: wear this armor to blend in with
item.mcda.turtle_armor.tooltip_1: The Turtle Armor is inspired by
item.mcda.turtle_armor.tooltip_2: the hardy and protective shell of
item.mcda.nimble_turtle_armor.tooltip_1: This armor is made from the dense
item.mcda.nimble_turtle_armor.tooltip_3: turtles who lived at crushing depths.
item.mcda.troubadour_armor.tooltip_1: Why leave your adoring fans wanting
item.mcda.troubadour_armor.tooltip_2: more when you can wow them with this
item.mcda.teleportation_robe.tooltip_1: The Teleportation Robes were made by
item.mcda.teleportation_robe.tooltip_2: those who devoted their lives to studying
item.mcda.unstable_robe.tooltip_1: This Enderobe sparks with static as you
item.mcda.sturdy_shulker_armor.tooltip_1: They say the best defense is
item.mcda.sturdy_shulker_armor.tooltip_2: a good offense, but good luck
item.mcda.gourdian_armor.tooltip_1: Those who wear the mantle of
item.mcda.cauldron_armor.tooltip_2: with camouflage in mind, but what
item.mcda.cauldron_armor.tooltip_3: it lacks in stealth, it makes up
item.mcda.sweet_tooth.tooltip_1: This armor may look like a piece
item.mcda.sweet_tooth.tooltip_2: of cake to your enemies, but it
enchantment.mcda.bag_of_souls.desc: Increases the amount of experience you gain relative to the level of the enchantment.
enchantment.mcda.chilling.desc: Slows and applies mining fatigue to attacker.
enchantment.mcda.cowardice.desc: When at full health, you receive the Strength effect.
enchantment.mcda.death_barter.desc: When you die, you can pay your way out of death with Emeralds.
enchantment.mcda.deflect.desc: When you are shot with an arrow, there is a chance that arrow will do half damage and could be flung away from you.
enchantment.mcda.fire_focus.desc: Increases the amount of damage done by fire attacks, especially Fire Aspect.
enchantment.mcda.fire_trail.desc: A trail of fire follows the player.
enchantment.mcda.food_reserves.desc: When drinking an Instant Health potion, you receive some form of food.
enchantment.mcda.frenzied.desc: When your health drops below 50%, you gain the Haste effect.
enchantment.mcda.heal_allies.desc: Allies (villagers, pets, golems, and other players) are healed when taking damage.
enchantment.mcda.lucky_explorer.desc: Chance to spawn emeralds with every block explored.
enchantment.mcda.poison_focus.desc: Increases the amount of damage done by poison attacks.
enchantment.mcda.potion_barrier.desc: When drinking an Instant Health potion, you receive the Resistance effect.
enchantment.mcda.reckless.desc: Your health is reduced by 60% but you gain the Strength effect relative to the level of the enchantment.
enchantment.mcda.recycler.desc: There is a chance when shot with an arrow that you will gain an arrow, having caught or picked up the arrow you were shot with.
enchantment.mcda.snowball.desc: When being attacked by two or more attackers, a magical snowball will be thrown at one of the attackers, knocking them back.
enchantment.mcda.surprise_gift.desc: When drinking an Instant Health potion, you receive another potion from a pool of options.
enchantment.mcda.swiftfooted.desc: When jumping, you gain several seconds of speed boost.
